content.raw: Yeah, that would be another way to fix the problem.  The benefit to it is that code like that makes it really clear that we want things in a particular order.  The downside is that it adds more code, that we get more-or-less for "free" by using a set.  My preference would be to restore this functionality like it is (using a set), and then improve it later by doing what you say (once we have good unit tests for the problem).  Thoughts?
